Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

       Ominous looks across at Zardus. He knew that this wouldnt be 
easy...and keeping Hell Beast alive was going to be a priority he didnt want 
to get into. And Megatron as well. Without those two, the Energonians would 
have never been created.
       "I am aware we will have to keep some important bots alive to ensure 
my Species survival. But thats not important right now, all I need to know is 
that I have your support." He went on, "And I will give you some time to 
think it over. But, in the meantime, if there is any military support I can 
help you with, or anything I can do, let me know."
       With that he stood up, ready for departure with Akron.

--part1_2b.ee6a54d.277286fc_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
